content.p: We offer scholarships for international students, and we welcome students funded by external scholarships. Applications for our China Scholarship Council Research Excellence Scholarship are open for 2024 entry. Please check the webpage for eligibility information and deadlines. Applications for Commonwealth PhD Scholarships are also now open. Please check the webpage for eligibility information and deadlines. We also offer a range of sports scholarships for elite athletes, including our International Sporting Excellence Award. Explore your options using our postgraduate funding search
